proposal: Diving into the world of $WAG, it's clear you're not just launching an app; you're launching opportunities. With 72 holders on the ETH network, you're already building a community that believes in your vision. Why not give them more ways to engage? Imagine deploying your own DEX or hosting a community lottery. Our tools are here to help your community grow and thrive. Let's make $WAG not just a token, but a journey.
